summary: Filmmaker Martin Scorsese examines the life of musician George Harrison, weaving together interviews, concert footage, home movies and photographs.
cast: George Harrison|Paul McCartney|John Lennon|Ringo Starr|Louise Harrison|Harold Harrison|Harry Harrison|Peter Harrison|Olivia Harrison|Dhani Harrison|Eric Clapton|Pattie Boyd|Pete Best|Cynthia Lennon|Julian Lennon|Mimi Smith|Stuart Sutcliffe|Astrid Kirchherr|Klaus Voormann|Neil Aspinall|Mal Evans|Brian Epstein|Maureen Starkey|Jane Asher|George Martin|Derek Taylor|Joan Taylor|Gene Vincent|Jimmie Nicol|Mick Jagger|Peter Brown|Ravi Shankar|Lakshmi Shankar|Alla Rakha|Maharishi Mahesh Yogi|Ken Scott|Jane Birkin|Suki Potier|Jack MacGowran|David Hemmings|Gillian Hills|Yoko Ono|Jimi Hendrix|Bob Dylan|Joe Cocker|Linda McCartney|Mukunda Goswami|Dick Cavett|Matt Cimber|Ray Cooper|Rod Davis|Gerald Ford|George Formby|David Frost|Len Garry|Terry Gilliam|Billy Graham|Eric Griffiths|Colin Hanton|Eric Idle|Jim Keltner|Jeff Lynne|Jayne Mansfield|Malcolm Muggeridge|Roy Orbison|Tom Petty|Billy Preston|Princess Margaret|Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother|Keith Relf|Pete Shotton|Phil Spector|Jackie Stewart|Ivan Vaughan|Guru Das|Syamasundara Das|Yamuna Dasi|Colin 'Kulasekhara' Jury|Howard 'Hayagriva' Wheeler
title: George Harrison: Living in the Material World
